doc:
Stephen Brooks (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephen_Brooks_(actor) 0 James Gardner Brooks Jr. (August 12, 1942 – December 1, 1999), known as Stephen Brooks, was an American film and television actor. Born in Columbus, Ohio, Brooks was best known as Special Agent Jim Rhodes in the television series The F.B.I., and his guest appearance as Ensign Garrovick in the Star Trek episode "Obsession" (1967). He died of a heart attack, aged 57, in Seattle, Washington. James_Gardner_Brooks_Jr. ( August_12_,_1942 – December_1_,_1999 ) , known as Stephen_Brooks , was an_American_film_and_television_actor . Born in Columbus_,_Ohio_,_Brooks was_best_known as Special_Agent_Jim_Rhodes in the_television_series The_F.B.I. , and his_guest_appearance as Ensign_Garrovick in the_Star_Trek_episode_"_Obsession " (_1967_) . He died of a_heart_attack , aged_57 , in Seattle , Washington .
